price: 3. Nabii Mucammadow Nabii Muusaa kee firqawni xaagu nummah koh warisnaah kol nakriye, Qhuraan nummaysa maray usuk Yallih xaquk yanim kaak yaaxige kaal taamitamkeh.
arabic: نَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكَ مِن نَّبَإِ مُوسَىٰ وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لِقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: natlū ʿalayka min naba-i mūsā wafir'ʿawna bil-ḥaqi liqawmin yu'minūna
